alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Lawrence and southwestern Jackson Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Bedford to 15 miles northwest of Salem to 13 miles southwest of Brownstown. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Lawrence and southwestern Jackson Counties, including the following locations... Pleasant View, Vallonia and Medora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
